Content:: The Great American Economic Revival Industry Groups were created by U.S. President Donald Trump to combat the economic impact of the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.[1] Trump originally proposed a second task force, following the White House Coronavirus Task Force.[2] He later referred to the group as the "opening our country taskforce" and "opening our country council".[3] Larry Kudlow and Steve Mnuchin were expected to be named members.[4] Further details were expected to be announced in mid April 2020.[5][6]
Title: Great American Economic Revival Industry Groups - Wikipedia
